    • Method Detail

      • createAutor

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                consumes="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createAutor(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                     AutorRequest autorRequest,
                                                                                                                                                     org.springframework.web.util.UriComponentsBuilder builder)
        POST /v1/autors : Create a new one autorEntity.
        Parameters:
        autorRequest - the AutorRequest to create
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new AutorRequest, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the Autor has already an name
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - When the author already exists this exception

      • updateAutot

        @RequestMapping(value="{id}",
                method=PUT,
                consumes="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateAutot(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                     AutorRequest autorRequest,
                                                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.Long id)
        PUT /v1/autors/nome : Update a new one of AutorEntity.
        Parameters:
        autorRequest - the AutorRequest to create
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (Update) and with body the new AutorRequest, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the Autor has already an name
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect

      • listAllAutores

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CollectionResponse<AutorResponse>> listAllAutores()
        GET /v1/autors/ : List a new autorEntity.
        Returns:
        List of AutorResponse with status 200 (OK) and with body the new AutorRequest, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the Autors has already an name
